message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you. I am offering it to you for $1050000, reflecting its true worth while allowing us to share the benefits. I believe this price presents an excellent opportunity for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $980000. I hope this aligns better with my budget while still respecting the product's worth.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand the financial considerations involved. In light of your proposal, I am willing to consider $1000000 as a compromise, aiming to find a mutually beneficial solution.
